thread.title: Seun Kuti blasts Nigerian President over ministerial list
thread.title_full: Seun Kuti blasts Nigerian President over ministerial list

title: Seun Kuti blasts Nigerian President over ministerial list
text:
Date: 08-10-2015 Time: 08:10:34:am Seun Kuti 
Like many other Nigerians, Afrobeat singer and son of the late Fela, Seun Kuti couldn’t hide his disappointed after the revelation of the name of politicians who made the list of ministers as chosen by President Buhari. 
The ‘From Africa With Fury’ act took his annoyance to his facebook account where he vented his disappointment. 
In three posts, Seun condemned the list positing that it was still the same old politicians who have destroyed the country that have been named by the President again.
